title: A enzyme-free fluorescence quenching sensor for amplified detection of kanamycin in milk based on competitive triggering strategies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19076-19082
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01703J, Paper

Yangyinchun Bao, Yidan Sang, Xuemei Yan, Mengyang Hu, Na Wang, Yafei Dong, Luhui Wang
In this work, we constructed a FAM fluorescence quenching biosensor based on an aptamer competition recognition and enzyme-free amplification strategy.
